Class RobotAbstractImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.phybots.entity.EntityImpl
      com.phybots.entity.RobotAbstractImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Entity, Robot, EventProvider, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
HakoniwaRobot, PhysicalRobotAbstractImpl, ProxyRobotAbstractImpl
public abstract class RobotAbstractImpl
extends EntityImpl
implements Robot

Abstract implementation of Robot.
Robot classes must extend this abstract class.

Author:
Jun Kato
